title: ExxonMobil's CEO says fighting climate change shouldn't mean getting rid of oil
description: The emissions associated with the combustion' of oil is the problem
keywords: ExxonMobil, Greenhouse gas emissions, Climate change denial, Emission intensity, Rockefeller family, Exxon, Darren Woods, Environment, Business, Finance, Carbon finance, Quartz
snippet:
ExxonMobil CEO Darren Woods thinks we focus too much on the climate change-fighting tactic of weaning ourselves off of fossil fuels.
